q: "One of the reasons this show stands out from the rest is that it's the only show where the contestants take an active role in deciding who's in the band," Simon Lythgoe said. Whereas contestants must sing in different genres on other shows, this is all about country music. Our contestants will turn some world-renowned songs from other genres like pop or Motown, pour their soul into it and make it country.
